variables.name: Income
variables.description: Total taxable income for tax calculation.

variables.name: Bracket_1
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 1: 0.25% on the portion of income up to $1000. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_2
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 2: 0.75% on the portion of income over $1000 up to $2500. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_3
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 3: 1.75% on the portion of income over $2500 up to $3750. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_4
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 4: 2.75% on the portion of income over $3750 up to $4900. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_5
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 5: 3.75% on the portion of income over $4900 up to $7200. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: Bracket_6
variables.description: Taxes for Bracket 6: 4.75% on the portion of income above $7200. Always included in the sum; 0 if income does not reach this bracket.

variables.name: FinalTaxes
variables.description: Sum of Bracket_1 through Bracket_6 in numerical order. Includes zeros from brackets that do not apply. Calculation must always add all six brackets explicitly.

rules.translation: FinalTaxes is greater or equal to 0
